# [Interview #24: LOC Signing Report - Erica Sadun, Entry #23](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=24#23)

#### Question

Is the "binding like criminals" meant to be using the Oath Rod?

#### Robert Jordan

No comment.
